title: Aashiana Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Middle Eastern, Pakistani, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pakistani-Indian-Middle Eastern cuisine restaurant established since 1999. While menu is primarily meat-based, the owner is accommodating to vegan requests. All vegetable dishes that do not list dairy ingredients are vegan suitable as are several salads, sides, and sauces. Has bean and vegetable based dishes. The lunch buffet always has vegan rice, sauces, salads, hummus, and 2 vegan hot dishes. Try the hummus.
